title: Create a New Work Order
description: A production planner needs to create a new work order for a custom product.

tasks.description: Retrieve the Bill of Materials (BOM) and routing information for the specified product.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly pulls the complete BOM and routing from the ERP system.

tasks.description: Create a new work order, specifying the quantity, due date, and associated BOM/routing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the work order with all required details.

tasks.description: Release the work order to the production floor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent changes the work order status to 'Released'.
